publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1266.1 Christine Grahame: Responsible Procurement Strategy—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1266) in the name of Joe FitzPatrick, after "key performance indicator" insert "; welcomes the commitment to incorporate animal welfare as an area for policy development, which is another example of the Scottish Parliament taking a lead on an issue of public concern". Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-1266.1 Christine Grahame: Responsible Procurement Strategy—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1266) in the name of Joe FitzPatrick, after "key performance indicator" insert "; welcomes the commitment to incorporate animal welfare as an area for policy development, which is another example of the Scottish Parliament taking a lead on an issue of public concern". Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
